title: At GTC-DC a couple of new open models were announced, we contributed: Nemotron Nano 3, Nemotron Nano 2 VL, Nemotron Parse, Clara Reason.
We have 5 papers accepted to NeurIPS 2025, see you in San Diego! Nemotron-CLIMB, Nemotron-Flash, GSPN-2, Long-RL, Minitron-SSM.
New NVIDIA-Nemotron-Nano-v2-9B is released on Hugging Face. We contributed to the compression part, architecture and data filtering.
